Uses of Interface
de.espirit.firstspirit.access.store.templatestore.TemplateBody

  • Packages that use TemplateBody 
    Package Description
    de.espirit.firstspirit.access.store.templatestore  

    • Uses of TemplateBody in de.espirit.firstspirit.access.store.templatestore

      Methods in de.espirit.firstspirit.access.store.templatestore that return TemplateBody 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      TemplateBody PageTemplate.createTemplateBody​(String name)
      Create and add a new body.
      TemplateBody PageTemplate.getBody​(String bodyName)
      Returns the template body specified by the given name or null if no body exists with the given name.
      Methods in de.espirit.firstspirit.access.store.templatestore that return types with arguments of type TemplateBody 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<TemplateBody> Allowed.getAllowedBodies()
      Returns the immutable list of template bodies for which the belonging template is allowed.
      Use Allowed.addAllowedBody(TemplateBody) and Allowed.removeAllowedBody(TemplateBody) to modify this list.
      List<? extends TemplateBody> PageTemplate.getBodies()
      Returns the list of template bodies which are defined in this template.
      Methods in de.espirit.firstspirit.access.store.templatestore with parameters of type TemplateBody 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Allowed.addAllowedBody​(TemplateBody templateBody)
      Adds the given TemplateBody to the list of allowed bodies of this allowed node
      Allowed PageTemplate.createAllowed​(TemplateBody body, MasterTemplate template)
      Creates a new allowed node for the given section- or table template which should be allowed for the given body
      List<MasterTemplate> PageTemplate.getAllowedTemplates​(TemplateBody templateBody)
      Get the list of section- or table templates which are allowed for this page template for the given template body.
      Note: If there aren't any allowed definitions for this pagetemplate, all existing section- and table templates will be returned.
      boolean PageTemplate.isTemplateAllowed​(TemplateBody templateBody, MasterTemplate template)
      Indicates whether the given template is allowed for the given body or not.
      void Allowed.removeAllowedBody​(TemplateBody templateBody)
      Removes the given TemplateBody from the list of allowed bodies of this allowed node
      Method parameters in de.espirit.firstspirit.access.store.templatestore with type arguments of type TemplateBody 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void PageTemplate.setBodies​(List<? extends TemplateBody> bodies)
      Set the list of bodies for this template.
